div.div: For development reasons, data on activities is divided into 'corpus' sections. Each corpus contains the master list of activitySets, the collection of activities and the OLAP

Initially there will be four corpuses - 3 public and one private. The private corpus vstore is used for casual loading and validation. Files and collections are publicly writeable to supprt the ad-hoc validation
The corpus descriptor contains the reference for the pipeline for that corpus. Currently vstore has no pipeline defined whilst the others use the only defined pipeline.
